item.title: Fly tipping x 3 from 83 to 89 Lordship Park N16, 15th September
item.description:
For weeks the 3 piles of fly tipping have been sitting on the pavement outside nos 83 to 89 on Lordship Park. The owners of the respective properties are NOT taking responsibility. I am sorry to have to ask this but can the council PLEASE remove the items.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lordship Park, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large tree roots sticking up in cycle path, 15th September
item.description:
The surface of the compacted earth cycle path along Bonding Yard Walk has degraded so much that the tree roots stick out significantly and they are dangerous. There is a similar issue on the paved parallel footpath but it is not as severe.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28-36, Bonding Yard Walk, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: St George's flags on bollards, 15th September
item.description:
On many of the bollards around Elmers End Green and surrounding roads St George's flags have been sprayed on. These are part of an anti-immigration online campaign and are feeding hatred and division. Please can they be removed as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: SORN Vehicle on street parking, 15th September
item.description:
